document.full_text: wal-mart stores inc , the world's biggest retailer, will invest 1.2 billion reais ($759 million) in brazil this year to tap buoyant consumer demand in latin america's largest economy, the unit's top executive said on tuesday.
document.title: wal-mart to spend $759 million in brazil this year
lines_and_colors: wal-mart stores inc , the world's biggest retailer, will invest 1.2 billion reais ($759 million) in brazil this year to tap buoyant consumer demand in latin america's largest economy, the unit's top executive said on tuesday.
